last stitch p1 88/116 sts row 4 sl1k k2tog *yo k2tog repeat from * to last stitch kfb 88/116 sts repeat row 1 thru 4 an additional 5 7 times 98/130 sts note 1 for the smaller version if you have more yarn you can do more repeats if you like or even some garter just make sure you have enough left over for the final row and bind off note 2 for the larger version i did add another section of garter to mine if you don t like that you can do more section h repeats or you can just go straight to the final row and bind off row 1 rs kfb knit to last stitch p1 131 sts row 2 ws sl1k k2tog knit to last stitch kfb 131 sts repeat row 1 and 2 an additional 7 times 138 sts
